Hole by Hole

Proin vel venenatis mi. Curabitur erat lectus, dignissim

Hole by Hole

Hole 7 – 443 yards, Par 4
This beautifully designed short par 4 offers a great chance to pick up a birdie. Being a little more aggressive on the tee shot by taking on the first bunker on the right side of the fairway will only leave you a mid to short iron for your approach. Hitting a little left off the tee will bring into play the large water hazard both on the tee shot and approach shot. Missing right of this green is the safest option as anything left will not hold on the steep slope and you will most likely end in the water.
